channel.title: CVE Feed for WPJobBoard -- Jobeleon Theme
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WPJobBoard -- Jobeleon Theme

item.title: CVE-2022-47153|2024-08-03T14:47:29.393Z -- wpjobboard -- jobeleon%20theme
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPJobBoard Jobeleon Theme allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Jobeleon Theme: from n/a through 1.9.1.
